thread.title: Selena Gomez Is Stepping Up Her Street Style Accessories Game - Vogue
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez Is Stepping Up Her Street Style Accessories Game - Vogue

title: Selena Gomez Is Stepping Up Her Street Style Accessories Game - Vogue
text: Selena Gomez Is Stepping Up Her Street Style Accessories Game February 21, 2017 10:51 PM by Maria Ward Photo: AKM-GSI Selena Gomez frequently toes the line between feminine and edgy when it comes to her wardrobe choices, whether that means a ladylike printed dress for a romantic Italian getaway with The Weeknd or a winter-friendly crop top to touch down at Los Angeles International Airport. But no where is her fashion A game more consistent than with her transformative approach to add-ons. It comes as little surprise considering the pop singer was recently tapped to be the new face of Coach —a role that will likely also involve designing accessories for the label. Gomez stepped out in Los Angeles earlier today dressed in a tonal look punctuated by unexpected details, starting from the ground up. The 24-year-old paired her Timberland-style work boots with lo-fi joggers that hit at the perfect length to show off the shoes’ utilitarian details. A simple cowl-neck sweater in winter white added a contrasting element while peeking out from underneath a tailored overcoat. Gomez tied the look together with a minimalist Coach leather top-handle bag and tinted cat-eye sunglasses from Garrett Leight California Optical x Clare V.— both apparent favorites of the fashion plate. All of which proved that as with the multitalented singer turned designer, an accessory is even better when it can pull double duty. In This Story: Selena Gomez Recommended For You
